credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Design for Stained Glass, possibly for the Biblioteca Laurenziana
medium: Brush and brown wash, black chalk on laid paper, squared in black chalk
description: Grotesque ornament with masks, putti and fantastic anaimals.  In the center, a plaque displays the Medici arms. Below, the word: SEMPER.
name: Drawing
